comments.text:
This bug was encountered when attempting to create a replacement for content broken by bug #471015.

To reproduce, just open print preview on the linked page.  The 2nd through nth iframes are all placed on the 2nd page, overlapping.
The visual artifacts in print preview do not appear when printing.

click the "Remove float on dd" button to disable floating, then print preview again.  The content is rendered normally.

Iframes appear to be necessary to cause this to happen, I couldn't reproduce with simply paragraphs of text.  I will test a data URI version and attach it to the bug if reproducible.
comments.creator: bugs@m8y.org
comments.author: bugs@m8y.org
comments.raw_text:
This bug was encountered when attempting to create a replacement for content broken by bug #471015.

To reproduce, just open print preview on the linked page.  The 2nd through nth iframes are all placed on the 2nd page, overlapping.
The visual artifacts in print preview do not appear when printing.

click the "Remove float on dd" button to disable floating, then print preview again.  The content is rendered normally.

Iframes appear to be necessary to cause this to happen, I couldn't reproduce with simply paragraphs of text.  I will test a data URI version and attach it to the bug if reproducible.
Looks like data URIs work fine. Attached single file version.
